channel.description: Recent content in Aws.amazon.com/Blogs/Dotnet on .NET Ramblings

item.title: Deploy to Elastic Beanstalk with GitHub Actions
item.description: AWS Elastic Beanstalk makes deploying, managing, and scaling .NET web applications on Amazon Web Services easy. This powerful service is available to anyone developing or hosting .NET apps on IIS. In this post, I’ll demonstrate how to set up a continuous deployment pipeline to Elastic Beanstalk directly from GitHub using GitHub Actions. With just a […] Link to article: https://aws.amazon.com/blogs/dotnet/deploy-to-elastic-beanstalk-environment-with-github-actions/

item.title: Integrating Amazon Bedrock in your .NET applications
item.description: Recent developments in generative Artificial Intelligence (generative AI) have made it easier and affordable to create applications and experiences that improve the way we live and work. Generative AI is helping businesses improve customer experiences through assistants and conversational analytics and boost employee productivity through automated generation of content, reports, and code. In this blog […] Link to article: https://aws.amazon.com/blogs/dotnet/getting-started-with-amazon-bedrock-in-net-applications/
